title: Come home to Shadow Lake! 2 Bed / 2 Bath available!
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'A wonderful home in Doraville is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1700 per month.', 'This unit comes with 1100 sq ft.', 'Shadow Lake Apartments offers many amenities to our residents.', 'Take a swim in our lakeside pool, or enjoy grilling out in one of the courtyards while picnicking under a gazebo.', 'Tennis courts and a fitness center is also available, and feel free to update your social media status in our business center.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Central Air', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Dogs & Cats Welcome', '◾ Extended living room area', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Picnic Area with Grill', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ Tennis Courts', '◾ Clothes Care Center', '◾ Lake on Site', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ MARTA Access', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Scenic Lake', '◾ Se Habla Espanol', '◾ Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '◾ Wooded Views', 'Unit Highlights:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '◾ Sunroom', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Extended living room area', '◾ Fireplace in Select Units', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾', 'In Unit Washer & Dryer', '◾ Upgrade Unit', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '◾ Views', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A1E14249446D466']
